articles.title: Biocon says USFDA issued CRL for Bevacizumab license application | Mint - Mint
articles.description: The biologics license application was filed for Bevacizumab by Biocon’s partner Viatris
articles.content: NEW DELHI : Biocon on Sunday said the US Food and Drug Administration (USFDA) has issued a complete response letter (CRL) for the biologics license application (BLA) filed for Bevacizumab by Viatris.… [+1509 chars]
